**Community Ecology | Macro-Ecology | Theoretical Ecology**

I am currently a postdoc in the Bartomeus lab (https://bartomeuslab.com/), in the Biological Station of Doñana (EBD-CSIC) in Sevilla (Spain). I am funded by a Postdo Mobility grant (https://www.snf.ch/en/XIZpfY3iVS5KRRoD/funding/careers/postdoc-mobility). 

:::
